text: Hey team, looking to work with Matthew Taylor for Commonwealth Bank. Budget is approx $18,100 - need 3 x 2-minute tutorial, 2 x 10-minute unboxing, 2 x LinkedIn post, 2 x Instagram post, 2 x Social media takeover. 9 weeks exclusivity, 3 month engagement. Usage: 6 months. Start date: September 2025. Need to confirm: deliverables
